tool.name: Preprocess Icenet Data
tool.description: for regridding and normalizing icenet data
tool.command: python3 '$__tool_directory__/gen_masks.py' && python3 '$__tool_directory__/prepare_sic_data.py' --input '$siconca_file' && python3 '$__tool_directory__/prepare_era5_data.py' --input '$tas_file' --var "tas" && python3 '$__tool_directory__/prepare_era5_data.py' --input '$ta500_file' --var "ta500" && python3 '$__tool_directory__/prepare_era5_data.py' --input '$tos_file' --var "tos" && python3 '$__tool_directory__/prepare_era5_data.py' --input '$rsus_file' '$rsds_file' --var "rsds_and_rsus" && python3 '$__tool_directory__/prepare_era5_data.py' --input '$psl_file' --var "psl" && python3 '$__tool_directory__/prepare_era5_data.py' --input '$zg500_file' --var "zg500" && python3 '$__tool_directory__/prepare_era5_data.py' --input '$zg250_file' --var "zg250" && python3 '$__tool_directory__/prepare_era5_data.py' --input '$ua10_file' --var "ua10" && python3 '$__tool_directory__/prepare_era5_data.py' --input '$uas_file' --var "uas" && python3 '$__tool_directory__/prepare_era5_data.py' --input '$vas_file' --var "vas" && echo "regridding is done" && mkdir "data/network_datasets" && mkdir "data/network_datasets/dataset1" && cp '$__tool_directory__/norm_params.json' "data/network_datasets/norm_params.json" && echo "moved file" && #if ($config_file) python3 '$__tool_directory__/preproc_icenet_data.py' --input '$config_file' && #else python3 '$__tool_directory__/preproc_icenet_data.py' --input '$__tool_directory__/2021_09_03_1300_icenet_config.json' && #end if echo "preprocessing is done"

param.name: config_file
param.label: Config file containing all of the variables needed for the IceNet forecast

param.name: siconca_file
param.label: Monthly averaged OSI-SAF sea ice concentration data
param.help: preceding 12 months of the forecast initialization month are needed for optimal results

param.name: tas_file
param.label: Monthly averaged ERA5 2m temperature data
param.help: preceding 3 months of the forecast initialization month are needed for optimal results, can be downloaded from the Climate Data Store https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/reanalysis-era5-single-levels-monthly-means?tab=overview

param.name: ta500_file
param.label: Monthly averaged ERA5 pressure level 500 temperature data
param.help: preceding 3 months of the forecast initialization month are needed for optimal results, can be downloaded from the Climate Data Store https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/reanalysis-era5-pressure-levels-monthly-means?tab=overview

param.name: tos_file
param.label: Monthly averaged ERA5 sea surface temperature data
param.help: preceding 3 months of the forecast initialization month are needed for optimal results, can be downloaded from the Climate Data Store https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/reanalysis-era5-single-levels-monthly-means?tab=overview

param.name: rsds_file
param.label: Monthly averaged ERA5 surface solar radiation downwards data
param.help: preceding 3 months of the forecast initialization month are needed for optimal results, can be downloaded from the Climate Data Store https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/reanalysis-era5-single-levels-monthly-means?tab=overview

param.name: rsus_file
param.label: Monthly averaged ERA5 surface net solar radiation data
param.help: preceding 3 months of the forecast initialization month are needed for optimal results, can be downloaded from the Climate Data Store https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/reanalysis-era5-single-levels-monthly-means?tab=overview

param.name: psl_file
param.label: Monthly averaged ERA5 mean sea level pressure data
param.help: preceding 3 months of the forecast initialization month are needed for optimal results, can be downloaded from the Climate Data Store https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/reanalysis-era5-pressure-levels-monthly-means?tab=overview

param.name: zg500_file
param.label: Monthly averaged pressure level 500 geopotential data
param.help: preceding 3 months of the forecast initialization month are needed for optimal results, can be downloaded from the Climate Data Store https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/reanalysis-era5-pressure-levels-monthly-means?tab=overview

param.name: zg250_file
param.label: Monthly averaged ERA5 pressure level 250 geopotential data
param.help: preceding 3 months of the forecast initialization month are needed for optimal results, can be downloaded from the Climate Data Store https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/reanalysis-era5-pressure-levels-monthly-means?tab=overview

param.name: ua10_file
param.label: Monthly averaged ERA5 pressure level 10 u component of wind data
param.help: preceding 3 months of the forecast initialization month are needed for optimal results, can be downloaded from the Climate Data Store https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/reanalysis-era5-pressure-levels-monthly-means?tab=overview

param.name: uas_file
param.label: Monthly averaged ERA5 10m u component of wind data
param.help: preceding month of the forecast initialization month is needed for optimal results, can be downloaded from the Climate Data Store https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/reanalysis-era5-single-levels-monthly-means?tab=overview

param.name: vas_file
param.label: Monthly averaged ERA5 10m v component of wind data
param.help: preceding month of the forecast initialization month is needed for optimal results, can be downloaded from the Climate Data Store https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/cdsapp#!/dataset/reanalysis-era5-single-levels-monthly-means?tab=overview

tool.help: This tool is a wrapper to regrid and normalize data from the input variables for the icenet network which can forecast arctic sea ice up to 6 months. It creates numpy files, which can be used as an input for the icenet forecast tool.
